content.question: Based on the information, respond to the following questions. Identify the clause in the First Amendment that is common to both Engel v. Vitale (1962) and Zelman v. Simmons-Harris (2002). Explain how the facts in Engel v. Vitale and Zelman v. Simmons-Harris led to different holdings in the two cases. Explain how the holding in Zelman might affect educational policy in states with legislatures that support the ruling.

frqParts.text: Based on the information, respond to the following questions. Identify the clause in the First Amendment that is common to both Engel v. Vitale (1962) and Zelman v. Simmons-Harris (2002). Explain how the facts in Engel v. Vitale and Zelman v. Simmons-Harris led to different holdings in the two cases. Explain how the holding in Zelman might affect educational policy in states with legislatures that support the ruling.

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Explain how political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors apply to different scenarios in context.
